page.title: 19TRADE IN PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: { Oysters}are reared at Roundwood, Trelissick and Coombe.There are four oyster beds at Roundwood,five beds at Trelissick and one in Coombe. In Coombe creek Mr.Old uses his boat and nets to catch{fish}like Bass and Mackerel. At Cowlands creek there is a {pottery}.The person who owns it is Mrs.Mays.She is a very experienced potter and makes jugs,bowls and mugs. In our area there are only five{ {shops.}The shops sell toys,food,drink and every day things.Two shops have a postal counter. Mr.Laity a local{farmer}grows daffodils and transports them to London,America,Isle of Man and the Isles of Scilly.He also sells cows, pigs and eggs.At Roundwood farm they take cows and sheep to market for slaughter.
